member.name: T:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Aliases
member.summary: Contains functionality related to creating issue reports.

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Aliases.CreateIssueReport(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Issues.IIssueProvider,Cake.Issues.Reporting.IIssueReportFormat,Cake.Core.IO.DirectoryPath,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Creates a report for the issues from an issue provider in the specified format.
member.param: The context.
Issue provider for whose issues the report should be generated.
Format in which the report should be generated.
Root path of the repository.
Path of the generated report file.
member.returns: Path to the created report or null if report could not be created.

example.para: Create HTML report using the diagnostic template:

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Aliases.CreateIssueReport(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Issues.IIssueProvider,Cake.Issues.Reporting.IIssueReportFormat,Cake.Issues.Reporting.ICreateIssueReportFromIssueProviderSettings)
member.summary: Creates a report for the issues from an issue provider with the specific settings.
member.param: The context.
Issue provider for whose issues the report should be generated.
Format in which the report should be generated.
The settings.
member.returns: Path to the created report or null if report could not be created.

example.para: Create HTML report using the diagnostic template:
example.code:
var settings = new CreateIssueReportFromIssueProviderSettings( @"c:\repo", @"c:\report.html");
CreateIssueReport( new List<IIssueProvider> InspectCodeIssuesFromFilePath( @"C:\build\inspectcode.log", MsBuildXmlFileLoggerFormat), GenericIssueReportFormatFromEmbeddedTemplate(GenericIssueReportTemplate.HtmlDiagnostic), settings);

member.name: M:Cake.Issues.Reporting.Aliases.CreateIssueReport(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Cake.Issues.IIssueProvider},Cake.Issues.Reporting.IIssueReportFormat,Cake.Core.IO.DirectoryPath,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Creates a report for a list of issues in the specified format.
member.param: The context.
Issue providers for whose issues the report should be generated.
Format in which the report should be generated.
Root path of the repository.
Path of the generated report file.
member.returns: Path to the created report or null if report could not be created.

example.para: Create HTML report using the diagnostic template:
example.code: CreateIssueReport( new List<IIssueProvider> { MsBuildIssuesFromFilePath( @"C:\build\msbuild.log", MsBuildXmlFileLoggerFormat), InspectCodeIssuesFromFilePath( @"C:\build\inspectcode.log", MsBuildXmlFileLoggerFormat) }, GenericIssueReportFormatFromEmbeddedTemplate(GenericIssueReportTemplate.HtmlDiagnostic), @"c:\repo", @"c:\report.html");
